schema:creator: Curry, Ezra, Ethan, Emily, Angela, and Sean
schema:description:
__Artist's Statement:__ This is our painting project with the kids. The back ground is made from 16 A4 sized black construction paper taped together in order to make a large enough art area. The kids painted with their hands and feet dipped in paint. The first layer was one with predominantly cold colours. The kids dipped their feet in paint and walked around. Then we cut out stencils representing our family & home. The second layer was done over stencils with hands dipped in warm colours then stencils removed.  
 __Participant age:__ 4, 2, 1, 30, 30  
 __Category:__  Family Art (collaborative piece from members of same family)
schema:name: Our Family Sheltering At Home
schema:publisher: UC Davis Library, Archives and Special Collections
schema:sdPublisher: UC Davis, Archives and Special Collections
